title: Node
description: All JSON nodes in the das federated catalog have these properties

name.description: A short mnemonic for this node, suitable for use as a variable name in most languages.

type.description: The catalog node type. Since there are not many node types, this value can be used to dermine both the syntax and semantics of a node

version.description: The version of a catalog node type.  Different versions of the same type must serve the same function in the global catalog
